data.description:
The game is in the early stages, be patient, updates will make you happy soon <3

Welcome to "King of Magic," where you don the crown and wield the power to shape the destiny of heroes. As the ruler of this enchanting realm, you are faced with a pivotal choice: to dispense justice or mercy upon the accused hero who stands before you.

In this sandbox game a gallant guardian brings forth the condemned, seeking your judgment. Try to find more than 100 combinations of potions and help people! 

With many mystical ingredients at your command, each possessing its own arcane properties, the fate of heroes rests in your hands. Craft potions with diverse effects that can transform the hero in unique and unforeseen ways. Will you temper justice with benevolence, bestowing clemency upon the hero's soul?

From rare herbs to shimmering crystals and elusive essences, these ingredients hold the potential to shape and alter the hero's journey. Unleash the power of your alchemical prowess to create elixirs that bestow strength, vitality, or affliction upon the hero, altering their course and marking their destiny.

Enter the enchanting emporium of "King of Magic" and immerse yourself in the art of potion-crafting. Embrace the responsibility, test the limits of your wisdom, and let the elixirs of fate flow from your skilled hands. The hero awaits your decreeâ€”will you be their harbinger of salvation or their instrument of fate's unyielding justice?
